answers.answer: I'm 15 weeks and have high bp. I've always had it but got worse when i got pregnant. the put me on pills a week ago and since then my bp is normal. I'm also scared ill get diabeties as well. Sorry, i know this doesn't answer you're question.

question: ok i was diagnosed with high blood pressure at 13 weeks and i just found out that i have gestational diabetes. also as of right now baby is measuring a little small due to my blood pressre. Doctor told me if my blood pressure continues to go up that i will have to delivery early but as of right now she is not consered with babys size. i am scared to death that i will have baby to early. Has anyone else been through this and went on to deliver at their due date?
title: High Blood Pressure and Gestational Diabetes
